title: Old Gloom
desc:
Post 2434
- The next player gains **Gloom 1**, but it can only be removed if they draw, play, or get targeted by a card with at least one of the following colors: <:holy:1120560132150022184> <:hyrulean:1119825670864916551> <:partisan:1107460550268559380> <:slightlylightergreenbutwithalitt:1120008660454744117> <:wild:1106237191388143838>
